trans-unit.source:
One Commander is free for HOME use with a limited features set.
For commercial use, the PRO license is required, regardless if the user needs these additional features (labeled with PRO in Settings).
trans-unit.target:
One Commander is free for HOME use with a limited features set.
For commercial use, the PRO license is required, regardless if the user needs these additional features (labeled with PRO in Settings).

trans-unit.source: 1. Using the above button open the purchase page and paste the Hardware ID (it should already be on clipboard) and enter your email 2. After completing the purchase, you should receive an automatic email with activation code (check spam also) 3. Paste the license from the email into the field below
trans-unit.target: 1. Using the above button open the purchase page and paste the Hardware ID (it should already be on clipboard) and enter your email 2. After completing the purchase, you should receive an automatic email with activation code (check spam also) 3. Paste the license from the email into the field below

trans-unit.source: 4. Restart program to activate all features
trans-unit.target: 4. Restart program to activate all features

trans-unit.source:
Before making a purchase, please make sure you are signed into Microsoft Store with an account that you'd like to associate with this purchase, so you can reinstall it in the future and on additional computers with the same account.
The license will be valid for up to 10 computers used with the same Microsoft Account (as defined in Microsoft Store policy)
trans-unit.target:
Before making a purchase, please make sure you are signed into Microsoft Store with an account that you'd like to associate with this purchase, so you can reinstall it in the future and on additional computers with the same account.
The license will be valid for up to 10 computers used with the same Microsoft Account (as defined in Microsoft Store policy)

trans-unit.source:
Pro license is required to use in a commercial setting.
Please test it for a couple of days but if you find the program useful please purchase the license from the Microsoft Store (through About dialog)
trans-unit.target:
Pro license is required to use in a commercial setting.
Please test it for a couple of days but if you find the program useful please purchase the license from the Microsoft Store (through About dialog)

trans-unit.source: Proceed to terminate explorer.exe, delete Windows thumbnail cache files, and then restart explorer.exe? This will terminate all ongoing file operations!!!
trans-unit.target: Proceed to terminate explorer.exe, delete Windows thumbnail cache files, and then restart explorer.exe? This will terminate all ongoing file operations!!!

trans-unit.source:
Important: This is an experimental feature that will edit your Registry to make One Commander the default file manager and folder handler (Open/Save dialogs cannot be replaced).
This will make Windows File Explorer unusable - even when clicking a folder in File Explorer the One Commander will open.
You will need to unregister it if you ever move or remove One Commander (uninstalling it will not reverse changes)!
This will also enable running in the background for faster window opening.
Are you absolutely sure you want to proceed and you know how to restore the registry on your own if something fails (no support in case of recovery)?
trans-unit.target:
Important: This is an experimental feature that will edit your Registry to make One Commander the default file manager and folder handler (Open/Save dialogs cannot be replaced).
This will make Windows File Explorer unusable - even when clicking a folder in File Explorer the One Commander will open.
You will need to unregister it if you ever move or remove One Commander (uninstalling it will not reverse changes)!
This will also enable running in the background for faster window opening.
Are you absolutely sure you want to proceed and you know how to restore the registry on your own if something fails (no support in case of recovery)?
trans-unit.note: Message after clicking register as default file manager button in settings

trans-unit.source:
Do you want to restart program now to apply all changes?
This will cancel all ongoing operations initiated by One Commander
trans-unit.target:
Do you want to restart program now to apply all changes?
This will cancel all ongoing operations initiated by One Commander
trans-unit.note: When closing settings window after changing settings requiring restart

trans-unit.source: Important: This is an experimental feature that will edit Windows Registry to completely replace Windows File Explorer Win+E hotkey. This registry change will make One Commander open when clicking Explorer shortcut, but won't disable navigation within Explorer. The only way to reverse this is unregistering it from One Commander or running the registry script from One Commander folder (uninstalling OC won't change it automatically). Proceed?
trans-unit.target: Important: This is an experimental feature that will edit Windows Registry to completely replace Windows File Explorer Win+E hotkey. This registry change will make One Commander open when clicking Explorer shortcut, but won't disable navigation within Explorer. The only way to reverse this is unregistering it from One Commander or running the registry script from One Commander folder (uninstalling OC won't change it automatically). Proceed?
trans-unit.note: Message after clicking register Win+E shortcut button in settings

trans-unit.source: Show popup asking to extract or open in a default program
trans-unit.target: Show popup asking to extract or open in a default program

trans-unit.source: Downloads additional icons from onecommander.com if they are available. Check file icons dropdown after downloading.
trans-unit.target: Downloads additional icons from onecommander.com if they are available. Check file icons dropdown after downloading.

trans-unit.source: Consistent: Drag always moves; Ctrl+Drag always copies
trans-unit.target: Consistent: Drag always moves; Ctrl+Drag always copies

trans-unit.source: Inconsistent File Explorer way Drag moves if the same drive, otherwise copies. Ctrl+Drag to copy if the same drive. Shift+Drag to move to another drive.
trans-unit.target: Inconsistent File Explorer way Drag moves if the same drive, otherwise copies. Ctrl+Drag to copy if the same drive. Shift+Drag to move to another drive.

trans-unit.source: Context menu items with these verbs or full-text will be excluded; comma separated; no space after comma; the pre-populated verbs/commands are not supported by One Commander
trans-unit.target: Context menu items with these verbs or full-text will be excluded; comma separated; no space after comma; the pre-populated verbs/commands are not supported by One Commander

trans-unit.target: Changes in files with full-paths containing these strings won't be reported; Comma separated

trans-unit.source: Choice between default or TeraCopy (must be already installed)
trans-unit.target: Choice between default or TeraCopy (must be already installed)

trans-unit.source: Fix Stylus lag (breaks touchscreen double-tap to open)
trans-unit.target: Fix Stylus lag (breaks touchscreen double-tap to open)

trans-unit.source: Default OFF. If ON there will be no lag with graphic tablets, Wacom or Microsoft Surface stylus, but it will also disable double-tap (touchscreen) to open files (you would then need to use Single Click to Open folders option, and to open files by long-tap and Open from context menu). This is due to a bug in Microsoft WPF. Program restart required
trans-unit.target: Default OFF. If ON there will be no lag with graphic tablets, Wacom or Microsoft Surface stylus, but it will also disable double-tap (touchscreen) to open files (you would then need to use Single Click to Open folders option, and to open files by long-tap and Open from context menu). This is due to a bug in Microsoft WPF. Program restart required

trans-unit.source: Using anything except Windows Default will disable folder icon overlays
trans-unit.target: Using anything except Windows Default will disable folder icon overlays

trans-unit.target: If a folder contains a file named folder.jpg, cover.jpg, background.jpg or front.jpg, it will be loaded as its background image. Useful for music albums and movie posters

trans-unit.target: Default ON. Makes lines sharper on non-HDPI screens. Program is more stable when Off, but icons and lines may not be as sharp.

trans-unit.source: Turn ON if you prefer using Mebibytes instead of Megabytes 1 Mebibyte = 2^20 bytes = 1048576 bytes (IEC) 1 Megabyte (MB) = 10^6 bytes = 1000000 bytes (SI standard)
trans-unit.target: Turn ON if you prefer using Mebibytes instead of Megabytes 1 Mebibyte = 2^20 bytes = 1048576 bytes (IEC) 1 Megabyte (MB) = 10^6 bytes = 1000000 bytes (SI standard)
